translated: Pampryl is a French food company, born in 1926 in Nuits-Saint-Georges in Burgundy, where French wine growers who were struggling to sell their production, had the idea to press their grapes and sell the pharmacy.
original: Pampryl est une entreprise alimentaire française, née en 1926, à Nuits-Saint-Georges, en Bourgogne, lorsque des viticulteurs français qui avaient du mal à vendre leur production, eurent l'idée de presser leur raisin et de le vendre en pharmacie.
